mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ImageAnalysisResult (desertionNo, className1, probability1, className2, probability2, className3, probability3, popfile) VALUES (#{desertionNo}, #{className1}, #{probability1}, #{className2}, #{probability2}, #{className3}, #{probability3}, #{popfile})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ImageAnalysisResult WHERE desertionNo NOT IN (SELECT desertionNo FROM DogCharacteristics)
SELECT desertionNo, className1, probability1, className2, probability2, className3, probability3, popfile FROM ImageAnalysisResult
